Tanzania

Geocoded Health Facilities for Malaria Modelling

Standardized, geolocated facility information to strengthen modelling, planning, and decision-making

::: :::: ::::: :::: {.columns .country-main} ::: {.column width="70%"} ## Health Facilities Map ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: :::{.column width="30%" .toc-panel} ### On this page - [Overview](#overview) - [Demographics](#demographics) - [Services](#services) - [Data Download](#data-download) ::: :::: ## Overview {#overview} This section gives a general summary of health facilities in Tanzania. You can include charts, stats, or key messages here. ## Demographics {#demographics} Here you display facility-level demographic info, e.g., number of beds, staff, population served, etc. ## Services {#services} Details of available services per facility, e.g., outpatient, malaria, maternal health, HIV services. ## Data Download {#data-download} Provide links for users to download: - [CSV](../data/tanzania/hf_demographics.csv) - [JSON](../data/tanzania/hf_demographics.json) - [RDS](../data/tanzania/hf_demographic_sf.rds)
